abstract.p: We give a closed form for quotients of truncated basic hypergeometric series where the base q is evaluated at roots of unity.

open-access.p: Open access funding provided by University of Vienna.

custom-meta.meta-value: © Springer Science+Business Media, LLC, part of Springer Nature 2025

sec.title: Theorem 1
Remarks

fn.p: We found this creative telescoping relation using the implementation of the q-analogue of Zeilberger’s algorithm (cf. [3, 5]) within the QDifferenceEquations package in Maple.
The first author was partially supported by the Austrian Science Fund FWF, Grant 10.55776/F50.
Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

notes.title: Funding
notes.p: Open access funding provided by University of Vienna.
